name: Amber Baker
text: Pizza hut dinner buffet is always a perfect way to end the day. Today was a little sad because no lettuce due to the recall,however they gave us a discount on the buffet. Overall, the pizza is still great just like it always is! Thank you for great pizza. Can't wait to go back for the salad bar when the lettuce comes back!!!

name: Michele Liberato
text: Friendly crew, dinner buffet always replenished. 1 Server for the dining room but she was efficient. Food was great and was delivered to table pretty quick for a busy night. Restroom was clean too

name: Tricia Buskirk
text: Great.  But yesterday was their last day.  They're now closed.

name: James McMullen
text: It would be a 5 if based only on the server. He was excellent, but they said we could not order a thin crust pizza during the lunch buffet because they do not take requests anymore and they will not make thin crust pizza cuz it doesn't hold the toppings well.

name: andrew salonia
text: Best service normally dont give franchises or corporations reviews but an employee named evan needs a shout out nothing but good energy and professional service good job on hiring him goodbye dominoes

name: Joycelyn Swan
text: Great food and great staff! Thank you in letting my son have a crazy and fun birthday without any complaints.

name: Charles Johnson
text: Great midday week buffett with salad bar.

name: Jonathan Sims
text: Everything was pleasant, but the bathrooms couldsbuse an upgrade.

name: NaNi HeavenLee
text: Fast friendly staff. Quick in placing order. Pizza was ÄwéSömê. Fountain drink well good. Interior clean.

name: gabatho
text: Delivery driver was very nice, but the portion of pepperoni was light, there was one piece of pepperoni on each slice.

name: rupal patel
text: Feel compelled to write a review because the pizza was that bad. Don’t understand how a Pizza Hut could be bad but I guess just not the same as the main land. Wait till you get home to order some....

name: jack brennan
text: Never had I have pizza hut show me the pizza first before I picked it up to make sure I was happy

name: Cathy Kaneo
text: The food was nice and fresh, the service was great and the additional takeout was done at the perfect time.

name: Ben Watts
text: Fast and clean, 11 am pizza buffet. Good take out specials.

name: Rebecca Dunnett
text: Food is good but delivery service sucks. I live not even 5 minutes down the road and they don't deliver here. They probably only deliver to you if you live right beside the freaken pizza hut.

name: Allan Budde
text: Nice but slow from what I'm used too

name: Andrew Sarasin
text: The people working there were really nice, Buffet was good. The cinnamon sticks, the pizza and salad were all great and fresh!

name: Hailey Shannon
text: Even with coupons you walk out spending 20$+ on a pie. You can buy a specialty pizza from a local joint for the same price just done better. The entire place was filthy, including the restrooms. Service was good.

name: paul tilton
text: Dont Deliver 15 minutes away google maps... sad that I tried to order from you hopeful you will deliver to Kona where your location is

name: Israel Pantaleon
text: I called this pizza hut and I asked them if they delivered to my hotel the Shearoton in Kona so she asks me for my hotel phone number.... Mind you I'm in the pool area with my kids and I don't know the number by heart. So she asks me to …More

name: Joe Berger
text: Carry out is the way to go. Staff was friendly pizza was Pizza hut pizza. You get what you came for

name: Jeremy Crawford
text: The buffet worked great for the kids. The food was quite good for the price.

name: Jay P Gopal
text: Good that they exist and provide services and that extra option of culinary flavor,  some great staff recently doing their bit to keep it going, and quite clean in and out, and not at all bad regarding food

name: Sam Kiser
text: Food was good hot and priced right.

name: Troy H
text: Clean, not crowded better than the Hilo location.  4 stars is rated against other pizza huts.

name: Luis Enrique Bustamante
text: The pizza is ok... for some reason the pizza crust is very good here nor like on the main land...

name: Jennifer Bender
text: Pretty typical eat in pizza hut. Clean enough but under staffed like most food establishments in Kona. Staff works hard. Food ok.

name: StephERRN
text: Great place to stop for their lunch buffet!

name: Gordon
text: Pizza was perfect... Chicken-Bacon-Parmesan

name: eduardo gonzalez
text: Good service and pizza n salads good

name: Loak Kala
text: no delivery, ordering by phone was a nightmare would not recommend it

name: Ritesh Patel
text: Good pizza , like the old Pizza hut I remember, thin and crispy

name: Spencer Jones
text: Fairly mediocre as far as Pizza Huts go. Not bad, but nothing special. We normally go to Mahina Pizza to support local.

name: Bradley Twigg
text: Pizza was great as always service could stand to be worked on a bit

name: Jeff Waddell
text: The restaurant is a bit dated, but the food is really good:)

name: Patrick Ancona
text: Foods ok but delivery distance is a joke, they loose massive business because they refuse to deliver to the richest end of kona, idk what retard decided that not delivering as far as their main competitor dominos does was a smart business decision since dominos is horrible in comparison, have to wonder why'd they don't want to compete

name: Rachel Fitzner
text: Buffet isn't the best but the take out service is wonderful. There is a daily take out special as well.

name: Russ Rudel
text: The buffet is super good!

name: Matthew March
text: So slow.  Waited 2 hours for crappy food. Next time im calling Dominos. Dont bother with these people.

name: R. C. Hughes
text: Great staff.

name: John Behl
text: Good, to bad it is closing.

name: Simon Graham
text: It's pizza hut.

name: C. Tamashiro
text: Horrible service...waited 10 min to be seated with no line..sat ourselves and got our food at the buffet...and when the waitress finally came by 15min later she was upset that we sat at the table and started to argue with us about it...the buffet the needs help too

name: Dylan Reilly-Gober
text: The pizza is bomb but the wait time is a little bit.
